# The `PassTimingInfo.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This header defines classes/functions to handle pass execution timing information with interfaces for both pass managers. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This header defines classes/functions to handle pass execution timing information with interfaces for both pass managers.
